title: The Tulip marketing agency
description: Full digital marketing services. We help build brands, find future loyal customers for you, and help keep your business relevant online.
author: https://njegos.dev
header: We make your brand stand out
header-p1: At The Tulip, we offer full digital marketing services which will greatly boost your brand’s online presence and help you achieve your goals.
header-p2: We help build brands, find future loyal customers for you, and help keep your business relevant online.
servicesDescription: We provide top quality services in every major aspect of your online presence
webdevContent: We can optimize websites using repeatedly proven practices in a way that helps drive targeted traffic to your business via “organic” search results. We make your website easier for search engine to find and serve to visitors who are interested in your business.
designContent: We offer a team of professionals in various areas of design, ranging from product design to UX/UI design to branding and website design. We design in a clean and modern way with a pleasant aesthetic which can greatly improve engagement with visitors.
socialContent: Social Media helps drive traffic to your website, increases sales, helps build an audience who are likely to use your product and so much more. We can manage your social media with designing and upgrading your profile page, creating relevant posts...
ourTeamDescription: Meet our passionate team of professionals who are always ready to help you achieve your goals

milan.name: Milan Mandic
milan.description: Accomplished marketing veteran with great international experience in various marketing and leadership operations including multi-channel product distribution and marketing involving both start-ups and large companies. Milan is a results-oriented, decisive leader with proven success in marketing and leadership.

bella.name: Bella Summer
bella.description: With her thorough knowledge of research, development and implementation of marketing strategy, {N A M E} focuses on business development efforts and works on streamlining the communication between the clients and the Agency.

cobain.name: Shàng Qí
cobain.description: With more than five years in the E-commerce industry, expertise in corporate management, branding and client relationship management, Shàng Qí is always committed to provide top quality marketing services.

dusan.name: Dusan Copic
dusan.description: An experienced web marketing coordinator, Dusan has a substantial experience working in the western market. With the skill and knowledge of marketing, SEO and web development, he can be a huge asset for anyone looking to make their brand stand out.

bojan.name: Bojan Smiljanic
bojan.description: With a 15 year experience in both product product design and marketing, Bojan was involved with many clients and companies providing conceptual and full product development service and marketing, delivering fresh solutions for everyday products.

njegos.name: Njegos Vujovic
njegos.description: Experienced with on-site and remote work for agencies, consulted for startups, worked on digital products for business and consumer use alike. With experience working alone, in small and big teams, Njegos is a good fit for any web project.

contactDescription: Interested in what we have to offer? Send us an email and we'll get back to you soon!
formSubjectPlaceholder: Enter the subject of your message...
formMessagePlaceholder: Tell us a bit about your project...

notfound.description: You just hit a route that doesn't exist... the sadness.
